ููุง ุงู ูุฐุง ุงูููุฏูู ูุนุฑุถ ุทุฑููุฉ ุงุถุงูุฉ ูุต ุงูู ุตูุฑุฉ ุญูุซ ููููู ุงู ุชุณููู ุจุนูู ุชุฃุซูุฑ ุฑุงุฆุน ูุตูุฑู ุงูุดุฎุตูุฉ ุงู ุตูุฑ ูู ุชุญุจ ุฏูู ุงูุญุงุฌุฉ ุงูู ูุฌูุฏ ููุงุฑุฉ ุนุงููุฉ ุจุงูุจุฑุงูุฌ ุงููุฎุชููุฉ ูุงูู ุจุจุณุงุทุฉ ุณูู ุชููู ุจุงููุชุงุจุฉ ุนูู ุงูุตูุฑ ุจุฎุทูุท ุนุฑุจูุฉ ุฃู ุญุชู ุจุฎุทูุท ูุงู ูุบุฉ ุงุฎุฑู ูู ุฎูุงู ุทุฑููุฉ ุณููุฉ ู ุจุณูุทุฉ ูู ุงูุจูุฑ ุจูููุช ูุชุญุฑูู ุงููุตูุต ูู ุงูุจูุฑุจูููุช

________________________________________________________________________________________________

In this PowerPoint tutorial you will know how to make this awesome effect for your photo with PowerPoint in only 5 minutes

So, If you are looking for an awesome slide design in PowerPoint, this video will show how to make an animated image text effect that takes your images to the next level.

Absolutely, You can impress the others with this photo manipulation tutorial and even you can animate this text effect easily using PowerPoint to make this photo text effect!

Whatever you are searching for PowerPoint graphic animation, with this PowerPoint slide design tutorial, you will be able to make slide animation using text effect for your images.

So, in this channel we will make many videos for PowerPoint tips and tricks  that will able to know more and more PowerPoint design ideas and those videos with show a creative way to know PowerPoint hacks for presentation!

By following the steps in this video you will be able to make photo manipulation without the need to be an expert in photoshop, just simple skills in PowerPoint and you will be able to make such amazing photo manipulation!

This PowerPoint slide design made with PowerPoint 2019 but if you have an older or newer version it is ok, you can do this text effect for your photo easily with this PowerPoint tutorial animation!

If you like this video and what to know more photo manipulation, please like this video, share it with your friends and subscribe at this channel.
